snippet.title: Title: Strong interaction between plants induces circular barren patches: fairy circles
snippet.description:
Title: Strong interaction between plants induces circular barren patches: fairy circles
Authors: C. Fernandez-Oto, M. Tlidi, D. Escaff, M.G. Clerc
Subjects: Pattern Formation and Solitons (nlin.PS); Adaptation and Self-Organizing Systems (nlin.AO); Populations and Evolution (q-bio.PE)
